opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the decision of this case.

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Montgomery, Appellant.
Submitted November 9, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
John W. Packel, Assistant Defender, and Vincent J. Ziccardi, Defender, for appellant.
James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
May 13, 1971:
